select m_no, m_id, m_owner, m_phone, m_name, date_format(m_joinDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as m_joinDate, m_address from t_member where m_type = 'b'

select m_no, m_id, m_owner, m_phone, m_name, date_format(m_joinDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as m_joinDate, m_address from t_member where m_type=#{m_type} AND m_id like CONCAT('%',#{m_id},'%') m_name like CONCAT('%',#{m_name},'%') m_phone like CONCAT('%',#{m_phone},'%') m_no = #{m_no}
